text: Nicholas R. Felice (February 5, 1927 â€“ August 24, 2021) was an American Republican Party politician. He represented the 40th Legislative District in the New Jersey General Assembly from 1982 to 2002. He was mayor of Fair Lawn from 1972 to 1974. Felice was born in Passaic, New Jersey. Felice died on August 24, 2021 in Mahwah, New Jersey at the age of 94."Nicholas Felice", The Record, August 26, 2021. title: Nicholas Felice
